name: Fish Frenzy Link
description:
Are you looking for the best fish matching game? It’s your lucky day. Welcome to Fish Frenzy Link where you can relax, unlock plenty of marine bonuses and explore thousands of splashy levels.

Features:
* Over 130 smooth levels to enjoy
* Awesome marine power-ups and bonuses
* Double the fun with special seashell boosters
* Fun puzzles and challenges
* Collect fish from the bottom of the ocean
* Gorgeous graphics and effects
* Colorful fish figures!
